description:
Just went directly to PSPP without bothering to run SPSS and paying for it. Works perfectly, very clear and direct interface. I use it with Rstudio for easy vizualization and manipulation of data in an easier and more readly way.
Thanks for the work guys!

It's the open source SPSS replacement. Not for any serious statistics, but good for some basic data prep if you want the look and feel of a spreadsheet. Data can then be imported into R for modelling.
summary: very good for some basic data prep

description: Great app, one could spend some $$$ otherwise

I recently encountered an issue while trying to upload an ODS file into PSPP on Linux. Whenever I attempted to upload the file, PSPP would quit automatically without any error message. This was frustrating, as I was unable to proceed with my analysis.
even don't have an option to change confident level.this application not good for realworld research
